name: Madeina and the Summoner's Sorrow
description: Madeina and the Summoner's Sorrow is an action-adventure game for PC with influences from games such as The Legend of Zelda franchise, Oceanhorn, Hyperlight Drifter and Fez, where You play as the young summoner Madeina. Explore the world, solve puzzles, fight baddies and discover mysteries.
